attributes.action: Make Maternity Pay equal to the national minimum wage for your contracted hours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that all mothers should be paid at the minimum wage whilst on maternity leave.  Ie if you are contracted to work 39 hours per week then you should be paid at the national minimum wage for those hours.

Why should women be penalised for having a baby.
